description:
value as specified by level (minTypmax) of the time elapsing between the end of the input pulse (at least 90% of its maximum value) and the moment the corresponding output signal falls to 10% of its maximum value, of a bipolar transistor at reference conditions
1.   t_off} = t_s} + t_f}.|2.   The reference conditions at specifying times for bipolar transistors are normally:|- supply voltage|- collector current|- base current|- reference temperature
